pages.text: $(br) Greatly increases the power of the metals you are burning. $(br)$(br)$(br)$(br) Bonus: $(br) - It works for a short period of time and empties all reserves that are active at the time of activation.

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(br) + Duralumin: Nothing. $(br2) + Lerasium: Nothing. $(br2) + Both: Nothing.
